Package com.payd.shooti.graphics

Class ShapeDraw

java.lang.Object
com.payd.shooti.graphics.ShapeDraw
All Implemented Interfaces:
IDispose
public class ShapeDraw extends Object implements IDispose
The ShapeDraw class provides a convenient way to draw various shapes using a ShapeRenderer. The ShapeDraw class can be used to draw shapes in a Batch by calling start(Batch). The complete() method must be called after all shapes have been drawn to the batch.

The ShapeDraw class can be passed a pre-initialized ShapeRenderer instance in the constructor. The ShapeDraw class can also be initialized with alpha blending enabled by passing true to the constructor. If not enabled explicitly, alpha blending will not be enabled for the rendered shapes.

    • start

      public void start(com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.Batch batch)
      Starts the rendering process for shapes using the provided Batch and falling back to default ShapeType.Filled.
      Parameters:
      batch - The Batch instance used for rendering.

      Parameters:

      type - The ShapeType to be used for rendering.

      public void start(com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.Batch batch, EShapeType type)

    • complete

      public void complete()
      Ends the shapeRenderer and disables blending if hasAlpha is true. Begins the batchCache.

    • setColor

      public void setColor(com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.Color newColor)
      Sets the color of the ShapeDraw object with the provided Color object.
      Parameters:
      newColor - The Color object representing the new color.

    • setColor

      public void setColor(float r, float g, float b, float a)
      Sets the color of the ShapeDraw object with the provided RGBA values. The alpha value is multiplied by the given alpha parameter.
      Parameters:
      r - The red component of the color (0-1).
      g - The green component of the color (0-1).
      b - The blue component of the color (0-1).
      a - The alpha component of the color (0-1).

    • setColor

      public void setColor(com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.Color color, float alpha)
      Sets the color of the ShapeDraw object with the provided RGBA values. The alpha value is multiplied by the given alpha parameter. If the color is not initialized, a new Color object will be created and set with the provided values. Otherwise, the Color object's values will be updated accordingly.
      Parameters:
      color - The color to set.
      alpha - The alpha value to multiply the color's alpha value by.

    • reflectColor

      private void reflectColor()
      Reflects the color of the ShapeDraw object on the ShapeRenderer if it is currently drawing. The color is obtained from the setColor() method.

      public void line(com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.Actor actor, com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 p1, com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 p2, float stroke)
      Draws a line with a specified stroke in the coordinate system of the given actor.
      Parameters:

      p1 - The starting point of the line in the local coordinate system of the actor.
      p2 - The ending point of the line in the local coordinate system of the actor.
      stroke - The thickness of the line.

    • lineCenter

      public void lineCenter(float x, float y, float length, float stroke, EDirection.EOrientation orientation)
      Draws a line with a specified length and stroke centered around a given point.
      Parameters:
      x - The center x point of the line.
      y - The center y point of the line.
      length - The length of the line.
      stroke - The thickness of the line.
      orientation - The orientation of the line. It can be either EDirection.EOrientation.HORIZONTAL or EDirection.EOrientation.VERTICAL.

    • polygon

      public void polygon(com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2[] points)
      Draws a polygon with the given vertices.
      Parameters:
      points - The array of vertices that define the polygon. The minimum number of points required is 3.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the number of points is less than 3.

    • polygon

      public void polygon(float[] vertices)

    • curve

      public void curve(com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 startPoint, com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 endPoint, float curveAmount, int segments)
      Draws a curved line between two points.
      Parameters:
      startPoint - The starting point of the curve.
      endPoint - The ending point of the curve.
      curveAmount - The amount of curvature to apply to the line.
      segments - The number of segments to divide the curve into. More segments result in a smoother curve.

    • alpha

      public void alpha(boolean hasAlpha)
      Sets the alpha blending flag for the ShapeDraw object.
      Parameters:
      hasAlpha - true if alpha blending is enabled, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if the ShapeRenderer is currently drawing.
